TEXT.TITLE: GEN DYNAMICS <GD> GETS 182.5 MLN DLR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: General Dynamics Corp has received a 182.5 mln dlr contract for production of 1,391 guidance and control sections and spare sections for Sparrow air-to-air missiles, the Navy said. reuter
